top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.

LPT: 

Buy a small air-compressor that attaches to the battery, you don't need much. 

Keep a tire repair kit in the trunk with the spare. It is very easy to repair a tire, sometimes, without having to remove it from the vehicle. Then you will need the compressor to refill. 

Those "foam" tire repair kits, will destroy not only your tire, but the rim. 


LPT:  Actually just learn basic maintenance on your vehicle as well.
You should be checking your spare any time you check your tires period.
I check all my tires every week or two. Better to be safe. 👍🏻
LPT:  check it WAY MORE than once a year.  Temperature changes will have a dramatic impact on your tire pressure.
